description: A Condition specifies which special characteristics and treatments apply to a Sample (e.g., whether the Sample comes from a disease or a healthy tissue).

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

items.description: A key/value pair that further characterizes an entity.

key_type.description: A semantic type that characterizes the attribute key (e.g., oxygen saturation measurement (MAXO:0000616)).

value.description: The value for an attribute (e.g., a numerical value without the units).

value_type.description: The value_type that characterizes the attribute value (e.g., percentage (SIO:001413)).

items.title: Attribute

case_control_status.description: Enum to capture whether a condition corresponds to a case or a control condition.
case_control_status.title: CaseControlStatusEnum

description.description: A concise description of the applied Condition.

disease_or_healthy.description: Enum to capture whether a condition corresponds to a disease or a healthy state.
disease_or_healthy.title: DiseaseOrHealthyEnum

mutant_or_wildtype.description: Enum to capture whether a condition corresponds to a mutant or a wildtype.
